A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think Disney tried to make it cute & TRIED to make it funny. But they might get a lot of money on the Star Wars name\, merchandise\, & the next movie they break out with!! I didnt feel like Luke Skywalker was a Supreme Jedi\, nor Rey a master with a light sabor with her lack of training. Snoke was a snooze & Kilo Ren is a spoiled brat! I would not recommend this movie. Just stick with the classics.
